entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
